themes.name: Devotional Guitar
themes.description: Blend spirituality with musicianship by arranging and performing bhajans, aartis, and Sufi kalams on guitar. Emphasis on expressive phrasing, open tunings, and creating meditative textures.

courses.name: Bhajans & Aartis
courses.description: Gentle fingerpicking arrangements of devotional songs, merging open‑string drones with melodic ornamentation to evoke traditional instruments.
courses.learning_objective: Learn to create calming textures, integrate drone notes, and apply raga‑based phrasing on guitar.
courses.learning_outcome: Students will lead a small satsang or family prayer session, playing two bhajans with confident transitions and expressive dynamics.

modules.name: Basic fingerstyle lesson
modules.description: This is a basic lesson of fingerstyle guitar you can learn how to play Gayatri Mantra on fingerstyle guitar you can also learn lead chord and strumming together. Indian notation and guitar tabs are available.  in second line there is a typing error last three notes are b3 b3 b3 which are replaced by b0 b0 b0. Right notes are b3 b3 b3.

modules.name: Suno Gaur Se Duniya Walo | fingerstyle guitar lesson | Independence Day Special
modules.description: In this lesson you can learn how to play Suno gaur se Duniya Walon in  fingerstyle fashion. you can also learn how to play lead chord and strumming together.  Follow me on instagram   @superbhokal contact no. (whatsapp) -   7054604608

modules.name: Fingerstyle 4/4 strumming pattern (Lesson-32)
modules.description: In this lesson you can learn a new folk fingerstyle strumming pattern of 4/4 and watch a new folk song composed and written by Rahul Deo (Superbhokal).  LYRICS Man ka deepak dukh k toofano se jo ghabraaye Om namah shivay bolo Om namah shivay tan ki man ki antar man ki her pida her jaye Om namah shivay bolo Om namah shivay Aarambh tu hi hai tu hi ant Tu hi hai aadi tu hi anant jeevan se pehle tu hi jeevan k baad tu hi tu hi moksh tu anand tu permanand tu hi tu hi ek hi manter ati bhayanker teeno lok hilay Om namah shivay bolo Om namah shivay Music - Rahul Deo lyrics - Rahul Deo Chords G major  E minor  A minor  D major D7th and  F major

modules.name: Fingerstyle Guitar (lesson18)/Om Jai Jagdish Hare /Tabs/Chords/strumming/fingerstyle Guitar

themes.name: Fingerstyle Advanced
themes.description: Push your fingerstyle playing into professional territory with percussive slaps, tapped harmonics, alternate tunings, and complex song arrangements that demand rhythmic precision and creative flair.

courses.name: Bollywood Fingerstyle Covers
courses.description: Learn note‑for‑note fingerstyle arrangements of iconic Bollywood hits, capturing vocal melodies, bass lines, and rhythmic accents simultaneously on a single acoustic guitar.
courses.learning_objective: Develop independence between thumb and fingers, master melodic articulation, and internalise song forms common in Hindi cinema.
courses.learning_outcome: Students will confidently perform complete solo‑guitar versions of at least five Bollywood classics at small gigs or recordings.

modules.name: perdesia fingerstyle cover
modules.description: In this video you can enjoy perdesia song in fingerstyle fashion.

courses.name: Bollywood Fingerstyle Tutorials
courses.description: Step‑by‑step breakdowns of popular Bollywood fingerstyle pieces, focusing on technique isolation, slow‑tempo drills, and arrangement logic so players can adapt songs on their own.
courses.learning_objective: Gain the skills to transcribe melodies, map chord‑melody shapes, and troubleshoot difficult passages.
courses.learning_outcome: Students will arrange one self‑chosen Bollywood song in fingerstyle form, demonstrating proper timing and tone.

modules.name: Fingerstyle Patriotic song
modules.description: In this video you can enjoy teri mitti mein song in fingerstyle fashion. you can also learn how to play lead chord and strumming together.

modules.name: Fingerstyle Guitar advanced strumming khemta
modules.description: In this lesson you will learn how to play advanced khemta taal in Fingerstyle guitar  .You can learn very easily step by step.6 count beat is very useful in Bollywood songs. https://youtu.be/4s6WthNmUek

modules.name: Advanced guitar strumming pattern
modules.description: In this lesson we will explain how to play advanced  keherwa fashion in fingerstyle guitar.Keherwa is a indian rhythm but we will play in western style.It is also a slap guitar lesson.you can use this rhythm in bollywood songs so learn and use this pattern in many songs.

modules.name: Fingerstyle guitar strumming pattern keherwa
modules.description: In this lesson we will explain how to play diffrent type of  keherwa fashion in fingerstyle guitar.Keherwa is a indian rhythm but we will play in western style.It is also a slap guitar lesson.you can use this rhythm in bollywood songs so learn and use this pattern in many songs.

modules.name: Teri mitti main Fingerstyle lead guitar (lesson 10)
modules.description: In this lesson you can learn how to play teri mitti me mil javan song in fingerstyle  guitar. primary and Advanced both lessons are available. Guitar is tuned from D . https://youtu.be/yHItV8tBYJA (keherwa lesson) Notation -  (Re Re Ga Ga, Ga Re Re Re Ga Ga Ga RE RE RE RE RE Ga Re Sa Dha Dha Sa Sa SA Ni Ni Ni Sa Sa  SA Ni Re Sa Sa Ni Dha Dha Dha Pa Pa Pa pa Re Re Ga Re Sa Sa Sa Sa)    Music- Re Re Ga  Ma Ga Re Re Ga Re Re Ga Re Pa Re  Teri mitti me... Pa Pa Pa Dha Dha Sa Sa Ni Re Sa Sa Ni Dha Dha Pa Pa Dha Dha Sa Sa Ni Re Sa Sa Ni Dha Dha Dha Pa Pa Dha Dha Dha Pa Dha Pa Ma Ga Pa....

modules.name: How to play slow fox strumming pattern (lesson 7)
modules.description: In this lesson you can learn how to play slow fox rhythm and how to add slap guitar in this fashion.

modules.name: Fingerstyle guitar strumming pattern keherwa (lesson-3)
modules.description: In this lesson we will explain how to play keherwa rhythm in fingerstyle guitar.Keherwa is a indian rhythm but we will play in western style.It is also a slap guitar lesson.you can use this rhythm in bollywood songs so learn and use this pattern in many songs.

themes.name: Fingerstyle Essentials
themes.description: Master the foundational techniques of modern fingerstyle guitar—thumb‑index alternation, basic percussive hits, and melodic independence—while learning well‑loved Bollywood melodies.

courses.name: Bollywood Fingerstyle Covers
courses.description: Learn note‑for‑note fingerstyle arrangements of iconic Bollywood hits, capturing vocal melodies, bass lines, and rhythmic accents simultaneously on a single acoustic guitar.
courses.learning_objective: Develop independence between thumb and fingers, master melodic articulation, and internalise song forms common in Hindi cinema.
courses.learning_outcome: Students will confidently perform complete solo‑guitar versions of at least five Bollywood classics at small gigs or recordings.

courses.name: Bollywood Fingerstyle Tutorials
courses.description: Step‑by‑step breakdowns of popular Bollywood fingerstyle pieces, focusing on technique isolation, slow‑tempo drills, and arrangement logic so players can adapt songs on their own.
courses.learning_objective: Gain the skills to transcribe melodies, map chord‑melody shapes, and troubleshoot difficult passages.
courses.learning_outcome: Students will arrange one self‑chosen Bollywood song in fingerstyle form, demonstrating proper timing and tone.

modules.name: Fingerstyle easy lesson
modules.description: This is a basic lesson of fingerstyle guitar you can learn how to play Tere jaisa yaar kahaan on fingerstyle guitar you can also learn lead chord and strumming together. Indian notation and guitar tabs are available.  B1=sa B3=re E0=ga E1=ma E3=pa E5=dha   3rd strg open = pa (Lower octave) 3rd string 2nd fret = dha (Lower octave) 2nd strg open = ni (Lower octave) 2nd strg 1st fret = sa 2nd strg 3rd fret = re 1st strg open = ga  1st strg 1st fret = ma 1st strg 3rd fret = pa 1st strg 5th fret = dha  pa sa re ma ga re ga sa sa re G0 B1 B3 E1 E0 B3 E0 B1 B1 B3  pa ni sa ga re sa re sa dha sa G0 B0 B1 E0 B3 B1 B3 B1 G2  B1   ga ma pa pa pa ma pa -(2) E0 E1 E3 E3 E3  E2 E3 -(2)    re ga ma ma ma ga ma B3 E0 E1 E1  E1 E0 E1  ma dha pa ma pa ma ga E1  E5  E3  E1  E3 E1 E0  ma dha pa ma pa ma ga re sa  E1  E5   E3 E1 E3 E1 E0 B3 B1

modules.name: Fingerstyle Guitar lesson of Raabta (Lesson-13)
modules.description: In this lesson You can learn how to play Raabta song with the help of Fingerstyle guitar.There is a complete explanation of strumming leading and chording together. Musical Notation- pa ni sa ni sa ni re sa - [4] pa sa re sa re sa ga re [2] ga re re sa sa ni dha pa pa dha ni dha ni sa re ga ga re ga re ga re ga pa pa-- ma ga re sa  sa ni sa ni sa ni sa ga ga... dha dha dha ma ga re - re, dha ma ga re - re  ga re re sa sa ni dha pa  pa dha ni dha ni sa re ga ga re re sa sa ni re sa Stanza--- ni sa re sa , ni sa re sa sa ni ni....  dha pa pa dha ni sa ma ...ga re re dha ni sa re... ga re re dha ni sa sa... sa ni re sa ni dha ma dha,dha pa pa

themes.name: Flamenco & Latin
themes.description: Dive into the fiery world of flamenco rasgueado, rumba strums, and Latin jazz chord progressions, merging traditional Spanish techniques with popular Latin American repertoire.

courses.name: Introduction to Flamenco Guitar
courses.description: Foundational course covering flamenco right‑hand techniques—rasgueado, golpe, picado—plus essential compás patterns like bulería and rumba.
courses.learning_objective: Acquire muscle memory for rhythmic strumming flourishes, understand flamenco modes, and internalise 12‑beat cycles.
courses.learning_outcome: Students will perform a traditional rumba piece with correct compás, dynamics, and rasgueado articulations.

themes.name: Indian Fusion Guitar
themes.description: Fuse Hindustani/Carnatic motifs with Western harmony.  Explore ragas on the fretboard, incorporate tabla‑style percussion, and craft genre‑bending compositions.

courses.name: Bollywood & Folk Fusion

courses.learning_objective: Experiment with alternate tunings, rhythmic modulation, and tabla‑inspired percussive hits.
courses.learning_outcome: Students will compose and record a two‑minute fusion instrumental blending a chosen raga with contemporary harmony.
